verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You alone can understand A heart as hard as stone,
And make it soft again.
You alone can forgive, Forget the way I've been
At any time, When I cry...

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Cleanse my heart, Cleanse my heart.
Make straight my way; Cleanse my heart.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
You alone are faithful; You will mend the reed,
Nurse the dying wick to flame again.
You alone are merciful, You can show Your grace
To anyone, When they cry...
